item.title: Sue add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Memory believes before knowing remembers. Believes longer than recollects, longer than knowing even wonders." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Sue add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "I feel like a wet seed wild in the hot blind earth." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Sue add a quote by Epictetus
item.description: "Only the educated are free." -- Epictetus

item.title: Sue add a quote by Bruce Sterling
item.description: "Forget trying to pass for normal. Follow your geekdom. Embrace nerditude. In the immortal words of Lafcadio Hearn, a geek of incredible obscurity whose work is still in print after a hundred years, “Woo the muse of the odd.” You may be a geek. You may have geek written all over you. You should aim to be one geek they'll never forget. Don't aim to be civilized. Don’t hope that straight people will keep you on as some sort of pet. To hell with them. You should fully realize what society has made of you and take a terrible revenge. Get weird. Get way weird. Get dangerously weird. Get sophisticatedly, thoroughly weird, and don't do it halfway. Put every ounce of horsepower you have behind it. Don't become a well-rounded person. Well-rounded people are smooth and dull. Become a thoroughly spiky person. Grow spikes from every angle. Stick in their throats like a pufferfish." -- Bruce Sterling

item.title: Sue add a quote by Bruce Sterling
item.description: "You give a guy a license to steal, you've got to expect him to use it." -- Bruce Sterling

item.title: Sue add a quote by Bruce Sterling
item.description: "«I love both her and them. I have come to understand that she is what they are. A woman accepts a man, expecting that he will change. A man takes a woman, expecting that she will never change. They are both disappointed. Yet within this very disappointment is the primal source of all new men and all new women»" -- Bruce Sterling

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it." -- Confucious

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "If you make a mistake and do not correct it, this is called a mistake." -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "He who knows all the answers has not been asked all the questions." -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated." -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "Wherever you go, go with all your heart." -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones." -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "To be wronged is nothing, unless you continue to remember it." -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "You cannot open a book without learning something." -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "Respect yourself and others will respect you." -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "The way out is through the door. Why is it that no one will use this method?" -- Confucius

item.title: Sue add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Nothing happens until something moves." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sue add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sue add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sue add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Never memorize something that you can look up." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sue add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious." -- Albert Einstein
